text: aur yaad karo jab ibaraaheem ne kaha, "ai mere rab! ise shaantimay bhoo-bhaag bana de aur isake un nivaasiyon ko phalon kee rozee de jo unamen se allaah aur antim din par eemaan laen." kaha, "aur jo inakaar karega thoda faayada to use bhee doonga, phir use ghaseetakar aag kee yaatana kee or pahuncha doonga aur vah bahut-hee bura thikaana hai
